Title: WpfSimpleChart
Description:
Small Chart component for WPF

WpfSimpleChart is a WPF Control Library which can be used to visualize data in diagrams.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Small Chart component for WPF

WpfSimpleChart is a WPF Control Library which can be used to visualize data in diagrams.

Features
  • Barchart
  • Piechart
  • Stackedchart
